subject: Subject: Request For Legal R
body:
Subject: Request For Legal Representation To Secure Your Payment
Please read the attached letter and get back to me as quickly as possible.
I Look forward to working with you for your immediate payment.
Regards
Barrister Tunde Obasanjo

subject: Re:   Subject: Request For Legal R
body:
Hello Barrister Tunde Obasanjo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I've read the attached letter, but I must admit, some parts of it are a bit confusing to me. Could you please clarify what this immediate payment is for? And how does this process usually work?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sara

subject: Re: Subject: Request For Legal R
body:
Dear Sara

Thanks for your prompt responds and be assured that you have made a
very wise choice in choosing me to represent you as your local lawyer and
to secure your overdue payment unjustly held.

Note that I would not have involved myself if I have  any iota of  doubt on
my ability to secure your payment.

 I have carried out due diligence on your payment file  and I make bold to
assure you that I shall secure your payment within 7
banking days and  to your satisfaction.

My terms are as follows: You shall pay me 15% of whatever funds your are
paid as a result of my work as your lawyer. I need  you to write back  to
confirm your acceptance of the above term so as  to enable me commence the
processes.

Note the two major steps I shall take to get you paid without delay is to
secure the court and presidential  order in  favor  of your immediate
payment. I have already concluded consultations towards these directions
and I assure you that Mr. President payment consent can be taken for
granted through his chief of staff who happens to be me my former classmate.

I await your consent before I proceed with more details.
stay blessed
Barrister Tunde
